mapper.select: SELECT MY.COUPON_ID, COUPON.COUPON_NAME, COUPON.DISCOUNT, MY.EXPIRATION_DATE, MY.IS_USED FROM ( SELECT * FROM COUPON_POCKET WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND IS_USED = 0 ) MY LEFT JOIN COUPON ON MY.COUPON_ID = COUPON.COUPON_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE COUPON_POCKET SET IS_USED = #{isUsed} WHERE COUPON_ID = #{couponId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE COUPON_POCKET WHERE COUPON_ID = #{couponId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_ID FROM COUPON_POCKET WHERE COUPON_ID = #{couponId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
